posts.post_content: Probably the most straightforward and best of the ally-color creatures in M13. A 2/2 for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) with the opportunity to be a 3/3, and the chance to attack straight away if you have a spare ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)? Very aggro, and the art is suitably feral.
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
The internal design and flavor of this card is just perfect. It's a boar, in the forest, so it's ![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol). But if you start a fire in that forest with ![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) the boar runs twice as fast, thus haste.  
  
Masterpiece.

The reminder text is not very good.
